meanings.definition: A person, typically young, who has committed a crime or antisocial behavior.
meanings.sent1: The delinquents were caught stealing candy from the store.
meanings.sent2: The police officer arrested the delinquents for vandalism.
meanings.sent3: The delinquents thought it would be funny to prank their teacher.
meanings.sent4: The group of delinquents roamed the streets like shadows in the night.
meanings.sent5: The community worked together to prevent more delinquents from causing trouble.

meanings.definition: Failing in or neglectful of duty or obligation; guilty of a misdeed or offense.
meanings.sent1: The delinquents employee forgot to finish the report on time.
meanings.sent2: The student was labeled as delinquents for skipping classes.
meanings.sent3: The delinquents cat knocked over the vase and ran away.
meanings.sent4: Her delinquents behavior at work led to her dismissal.
meanings.sent5: The delinquents driver ignored the stop sign and caused an accident.
